Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of red pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is grey-black in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394525) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394525)
